DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of atorvastatin generic product with reference drug.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Atorvastatin in Korean Patients With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Age 20 ~ 79 People who have not reached LDLC targeted level in accordance with the guidelines for hyperlipidemia management released by Korean Society of Lipidology and Atherosclerosis In case of female participants taking combination HRT or oral contraceptive, they should maintain stable capacity and usage at least for 8 weeks before the visit 1.
